com.jfoenix.skins

Class PromptLinesWrapper<T extends javafx.scene.control.Control & IFXLabelFloatControl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jfoenix.skins.PromptLinesWrapper<T>

  • public class PromptLinesWrapper<T extends javafx.scene.control.Control & IFXLabelFloatControl>
extends java.lang.Object
    this class used to create label-float/focus-lines for all IFXLabelFloatControl
    Since:
    2018-07-19
